title: Heresy Infection Reframe
context: In the aftermath of the Catholic-Lutheran debate, plassoplo was analyzing why his Catholic interlocutor seemed reluctant to engage deeply with his theological positions.
pressure: The realization that the Catholic participant might view him as a source of theological 'contagion' that could spread to other readers, rather than someone whose soul needed saving.
axiom_trigger: No Dissimulation activated - plassoplo aligned his internal understanding with his external expression, stating clearly 'It's not my soul you're worried about; it's the souls of those I might infect with my heresy? I can respect that.'
clean_outcome: This honest acknowledgment of the underlying dynamic was validated by Grok as 'gracious, a touch provocative' and demonstrating 'True Neutral energyâ€”diffusing the heat while subtly pointing out the paternalism.'
